languages.text: "Они паразиты, что рвут на лоскуты всех, кого захотят. Твари влезают в кожу, будто в костюм, но рубашка не по размеру: оттого швы и расходятся". {n}Мститель смотрит на вас не моргая остекленевшими глазами.{/n}

"They're parasites. They tear whoever they want into pieces. These scum squeeze into a person's skin like it's a suit that's two sizes too small, splitting the seams in the process." {n}The vigilante stares at you without blinking, his eyes glassy.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Они паразиты, что рвут на лоскуты всех, кого захотят. Твари влезают в кожу, будто в костюм, но рубашка не по размеру: оттого швы и расходятся". {n}Мститель смотрит на вас не моргая остекленевшими глазами.{/n}

languages.text: “他们是一群寄生虫。那群人渣只要一时兴起，就会把别人撕成碎片。之后，他们会挤进那个人的人皮里，撑得到处都是裂缝，就像穿了件小了两码的皮衣一样。”{n}这个袭击者目不转睛地盯着你，目光呆滞无神。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They're parasites. They tear whoever they want into pieces. These scum squeeze into a person's skin like it's a suit that's two sizes too small, splitting the seams in the process." {n}The vigilante stares at you without blinking, his eyes glassy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “他们是一群寄生虫。那群人渣只要一时兴起，就会把别人撕成碎片。之后，他们会挤进那个人的人皮里，撑得到处都是裂缝，就像穿了件小了两码的皮衣一样。”{n}这个袭击者目不转睛地盯着你，目光呆滞无神。{/n}

languages.text: 「彼らは寄生虫だ。気に入った相手をズタズタに引き裂く。あのクズどもは、人間の皮をまるでサイズの合わない服みたいに無理やり着込んで、縫い目が裂けようが全然気にしないんだ」{n}自警団員は瞬きもせず、うつろな目であなたをじっと見つめた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They're parasites. They tear whoever they want into pieces. These scum squeeze into a person's skin like it's a suit that's two sizes too small, splitting the seams in the process." {n}The vigilante stares at you without blinking, his eyes glassy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「彼らは寄生虫だ。気に入った相手をズタズタに引き裂く。あのクズどもは、人間の皮をまるでサイズの合わない服みたいに無理やり着込んで、縫い目が裂けようが全然気にしないんだ」{n}自警団員は瞬きもせず、うつろな目であなたをじっと見つめた。{/n}

languages.text: «Son parásitos. Hacen trizas a cuantos se les antoja. Esta basura viste pieles ajenas como si fuesen trajes que les quedan dos tallas más pequeñas hasta que saltan las costuras». {n}El justiciero te mira fijamente con ojos vidriosos sin pestañear ni una sola vez.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They're parasites. They tear whoever they want into pieces. These scum squeeze into a person's skin like it's a suit that's two sizes too small, splitting the seams in the process." {n}The vigilante stares at you without blinking, his eyes glassy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Son parásitos. Hacen trizas a cuantos se les antoja. Esta basura viste pieles ajenas como si fuesen trajes que les quedan dos tallas más pequeñas hasta que saltan las costuras». {n}El justiciero te mira fijamente con ojos vidriosos sin pestañear ni una sola vez.{/n}

languages.text: "Alayı asalak bunların. İstediklerini paramparça edip işleri bitince kenara atıyorlar. Alçaklar! Kıyafet değiştirir gibi suret değiştirip yetmezmiş gibi derilerine diktiriyorlar." {n}Saldırgan, buğulu gözlerini kırpmadan bakışlarını üzerinde sabitliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They're parasites. They tear whoever they want into pieces. These scum squeeze into a person's skin like it's a suit that's two sizes too small, splitting the seams in the process." {n}The vigilante stares at you without blinking, his eyes glassy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Alayı asalak bunların. İstediklerini paramparça edip işleri bitince kenara atıyorlar. Alçaklar! Kıyafet değiştirir gibi suret değiştirip yetmezmiş gibi derilerine diktiriyorlar." {n}Saldırgan, buğulu gözlerini kırpmadan bakışlarını üzerinde sabitliyor.{/n}

languages.text: « Ce sont des parasites qui découpent qui bon leur semble. Ces ordures se glissent dans la peau d'une personne comme dans un costume deux tailles trop petites, en faisant craquer les coutures au passage. » {n}Le justicier vous regarde de ses yeux vitreux sans ciller.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They're parasites. They tear whoever they want into pieces. These scum squeeze into a person's skin like it's a suit that's two sizes too small, splitting the seams in the process." {n}The vigilante stares at you without blinking, his eyes glassy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ce sont des parasites qui découpent qui bon leur semble. Ces ordures se glissent dans la peau d'une personne comme dans un costume deux tailles trop petites, en faisant craquer les coutures au passage. » {n}Le justicier vous regarde de ses yeux vitreux sans ciller.{/n}

languages.text: "Sie sind Parasiten. Sie reißen jeden in Stücke, wenn ihnen danach ist. Dieser Abschaum gleitet in die Haut einer Person, als wäre sie ein Anzug, der zwei Nummern zu klein ist, und dabei platzen die Nähte." {n}Der Rächer starrt dich an, ohne zu blinzeln, sein Blick ist trüb.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They're parasites. They tear whoever they want into pieces. These scum squeeze into a person's skin like it's a suit that's two sizes too small, splitting the seams in the process." {n}The vigilante stares at you without blinking, his eyes glassy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sie sind Parasiten. Sie reißen jeden in Stücke, wenn ihnen danach ist. Dieser Abschaum gleitet in die Haut einer Person, als wäre sie ein Anzug, der zwei Nummern zu klein ist, und dabei platzen die Nähte." {n}Der Rächer starrt dich an, ohne zu blinzeln, sein Blick ist trüb.{/n}
